entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as being scared and excited, and is described as raising his eyebrows in response to something.

entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who is known for her famous lion-topped hat. She is mentioned as having taken sides with the green and silver end of the stadium.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: The referee of the Quidditch match, who is standing ready to release the balls from a crate. She instructs the captains to shake hands and mount their brooms.

entities.name: urquhart
entities.description: The new Slytherin Captain, who shakes hands with Harry as instructed by Madam Hooch.

relationships.description: Harry interacts with Madam Hooch when she instructs the captains to shake hands and mount their brooms.
Harry shakes hands with Urquhart as instructed by Madam Hooch.
